G

Game - Class in ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez
 
Game(int, String, String, int) - Constructor for class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.Game
creates two new threads t1 and t2 having player1 and player2 as targets (given the fact that they implement Runnable) while the board is not empty each player will take a token from the board and it will be checked if he has won
getId() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.Token

getNumberOfTokens() - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.Board

getToken() - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.Player
firstly, this will allow the thread other to generate the position of the token on the board (token which will be taken by the player), then wait for it to be generated and then removing it from the board and adding it to the stack of tokens each player has
getToken(int) - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.Board
